Literature.Title: Supramolecular amphipathicity for probing antimicrobial propensity of host defence peptides.
Literature.Author: Ravi J, Bella A, Correia AJ, Lamarre B, Ryadnov MG

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>100 µM,Bovine erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=>100µM),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=>100µM)
